heading: HR00393
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS TO RESTORE THE P351.9 MILLION BUDGET SLASHED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT FROM THE MAINTENANCE AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSES OF 35 STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES IN THE PROPOSED 2017 NATIONAL BUDGET AND STUDY OPTIONS TO ESTABLISH FREE PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR ALL AT ALL LEVELS
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-09-30
history:
